Package ohos.nfc

Interface NfcController.ReaderModeCallback

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRemoteBroker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NfcController.ReaderModeCallbackStub
    Enclosing class:
    NfcController

    public static interface NfcController.ReaderModeCallback
extends IRemoteBroker
    A callback to be invoked when the system finds a tag while the foreground page is operating in reader mode.
    See Also:
    NfcController.setReaderMode(ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability, ohos.nfc.NfcController.ReaderModeCallback, int, ohos.interwork.utils.PacMapEx)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int TRANSACTION_ON_CALLBACK
      Indicates the transaction code of the callback specific to inter-process communication (IPC).
